name: Nexxus Adventure
description:
Nexxus Adventure is an RPG that takes inspiration from the 16-bit era Final Fantasies. This is a first look beta so many skills, attacks and even quests are still subject to change. If you have any advice or recommendations please let me know in the comments. There are five sidequests and one main quest in the demo, which equals about roughly one hour of playtime.

Credits.

Music done by Panman Music, David Vitas and Leviatan Music

Battle Menu made possible SomeRandomDudes Super Tools Engine

Plugins by Yanfly
